title: Tracks the progress of Cholera epidemic in Malawi (2022-23)
text: package provides access one dataset choleramalawi. contains data progress cholera epidemic district Malawi 2022-23. data focuses cases deaths every week well cumulative cases deaths.

title: Tracks the progress of Cholera epidemic in Malawi (2022-23)
text: dataset choleramalawi contains data progress cholera epidemic Malawi (2022-23). 1886 observations 8 variables overview variable names, see following table.

title: Tracks the progress of Cholera epidemic in Malawi (2022-23)
code: library(choleramalawi)  # Top districts by total cases  choleramalawi |>   group_by(district) |>   summarise(total_cases = sum(cases, na.rm = TRUE)) |>   arrange(desc(total_cases)) |>   head(10) |>   gt() |>   as_raw_html() # Plotting the number of cases over time in Lilongwe district  library(ggplot2)  choleramalawi |>   filter(district == "Lilongwe") |>   ggplot(aes(x = week, y = cases)) +   geom_line() +   labs(title = "Number of cases over time in Lilongwe district",        x = "Week",        y = "Cases") # Plot a map of districts of Malawi colored by the number of cases total_cases_district <- choleramalawi |>   group_by(district) |>   summarise(total_cases = sum(cases, na.rm = TRUE)) |>    mutate(total_cases = ifelse(is.na(total_cases), 0, total_cases)) malawi_map <- ne_states(country = "Malawi", returnclass = "sf")  malawi_map <- malawi_map %>%   left_join(total_cases_district, by = c("name" = "district"))  ggplot(malawi_map) +   geom_sf(aes(fill = total_cases)) +   scale_fill_viridis_c(guide="none") +    theme_void() +   labs(title = "Cholera Cases by District in Malawi")

title: Title: Cholera Epidemic in Malawi — choleramalawi
Title: Cholera Epidemic in Malawi — choleramalawi
text: tibble 1886 rows 8 variables epi_week Week epidemic week_start Week year week Date week cases . recorded cases deaths . recorded deaths c_cases Cumulative cases since start epidemic c_deaths Cumulative deaths since start epidemic district District Malawi record collected
